name: Escape the eXo-Planet Locate Objects and Rescue Everyone
name_original: Escape the eXo-Planet Locate Objects and Rescue Everyone
description:
Submissions for the Honest Jam 5

You are in charge of a small group of explorers who are stranded on an alien planet. Around your ship, there are several mines and factories. Your goal is to control your explorers between these buildings and have the carry resources so you can assemble some key objects like rovers and generators.

Each level has a different set of objects required to collect before your ship is ready to depart.

Please note: I completed the level design of the main level at 23:57 and didn't have time to test it, and I've got work early tomorrow... So there might be a patch coming tomorrow evening if it is broken and impossible to complete.
